project_abstract.cdata: This project paper seeks the approval of the Executive Directors to provide an additional International Development Association (IDA) to the Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste for the Education Sector Support Project (ESSP). The operation will support the Ministry of Education (MoEd) to: i) provide all primary schools with adequate student and teacher furniture, ii) implement a successful learning materials policy, especially for early grades, and iii) improve early grade learning achievement. The financing is expected to: i) improve primary education services through the procurement of furniture for 54,000 expected beneficiaries in primary and remote area filial schools in all 13 districts; ii) train 4,500 teachers on early grade literacy and numeracy teaching methods, indirectly reaching 140,000 students in grades 1-3; and iii) provide training on leadership, school management and quality standards to 750 cluster school directors, deputy directors and technical secretaries, and to 250 school board committees.
